title: Avenged Sevenfold - Hail to the King (2013) [iTunes stream] FLAC
description:
It's the same iTunes stream as every other torrents, except I recorded it losslessly. The stream coming out from iTunes is probably already lossy, then everyone records it and re-converts it to MP3, that's a lot of loss. That means what I did was I recorded it to WAV and didn't re-compress it to a lossy codec a second time.  I understand a lot of you won't care about that, but for those who know what this is, enjoy!

And please, buy the album when it comes out!
